analysis.key_quote: I find it interesting that OPM is arguing that the Garfield assassination supports this change back to politically appointing more federal employees - trying to completely reinterpret the actual events.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting the historical significance of merit-based hiring and criticizing the reinterpretation of events that led to its establishment. This reflects concerns about politicization and the erosion of merit-based systems.
